product_name: Luminox Recon Series Point Man Watch
long_description: Whether you're venturing into the wild alone or leading a group, the rugged and accurate Luminox Recon Series Point Man watch lets you measure your walking speed and navigate using the sun's position.
short_description: Whether you're venturing into the wild alone or leading a group, the rugged and accurate Luminox Recon Series Point Man watch lets you measure your walking speed and navigate using the sun's position.
